messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
I think somebody's breaking in the house. We just came home from school and put our pajamas on.
We're really scared. My mom's on her way here.
Okay. Do you hear someone at the door, or what's going on?
No, we hear them at the back door. We're really scared.
Do you hear them at the back door?
Yes, they're coming in now.
Okay, hold on the line with me.
I don't want you to hang up with me, okay?
I'm not.
Okay, I want you to stay on the phone.
Okay, I understand that.
We've got officers on their way there, okay?
How old are you?
Um, we just got home from school. We had a half day today.
My mom is on her way here.
Okay, who else is there with you?
My brother and my sister, but she just went to school.
How old is your brother?
He's seven and the other one's ten.
My mom said, since we had a half day, she was going to come home early to watch us.
Okay, I want you to stay on the phone with me.
Are you guys downstairs or where are you at?
Upstairs. We went in the closet because we're really scared.
That's all right. You can just stay on the phone with me.
I don't want you to hang up until an officer gets there, okay?
Okay.
How far away is your mom from the home?
She says she's on her way home, but I really don't know.
Okay. Have you guys looked out the window or anything?
No, because I'm really scared.
That's okay. That's all right.
I'm just trying to type this into the officers. They're on the way there already, okay?
Okay.
Where do you guys go to school?
We go to [School Name].
And you had a half day?
Yeah.
What grade are you in?
I'm in [Grade].
I'm about to go to [Next Grade].
Oh, okay. My daughter went to [your school].
Did she really like it?
Yeah, she did.
Are they on their way here yet?
Yep, they're on the way. I just wanted to keep you on the phone, okay?
Okay.
Yeah, I don't want you to hang up because I want you to tell me if you hear somebody in the house, okay?
Okay.
This is Officer Mueller, okay?
Okay.
And it's okay. He's going to meet you at the front door. Can you unlock it for him?
Yes.
You can stay on the phone with me, okay?
Okay.
It's okay.
Okay.
Are you opening the door now?
Yes.
Okay. You go ahead and talk to Officer Mueller now, okay?
Okay.
All right.
